subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Some playoff series are so grueling and punishing that the winner limps forward to the next round. The bone-rattling match between the San Jose Sharks and the Calgary Flames is one of them.
snippet: Some playoff series are so grueling and punishing that the winner limps forward to the next round. The bone-rattling match between the San Jose Sharks and the Calgary Flames is one of them.
